I have developed a special chipset that is able to improve the efficiency of machines.

This chipset is most useful in energy generators, where it can affect the generation and/or transformation of energy. The industrial chipset can increase energy production per tick or the profit from resources.
A industrial chipset of high quality (high chip power) will work better than one of lower quality. The usage of multiple chipsets can combine the effect.
Hint: The exact effect varies and is determined by the machine in which it is installed.
Hint: Refer to "Logic Chipset" for general information on chipsets.
